text: Abilly is a commune in the Indre-et-Loire department and Centre-Val de Loire region in central France. == Transport == === Road === The D750, D42, D53 and D358 roads pass through the Abilly commune. === Rail === Despite the fact that there is a railway line passing through the commune, there are no train stations. The nearest train station is in Port-de-Piles. == Population == == References == Category:Communes in Indre-et-Loire
title: Abilly
